comments:
Build ID: 3.3

Steps To Reproduce:
1.open preferences general/web browser
2.select "use external web browser"
3.ok
4.open preferences general/web browser
5.select external web browser
6.click remove
7. -> error dialog appears (see stack trace)

this only happens, wen no "system default browser" exists (like under windows) - this default browser cannot be removed.

i saw this error on solaris where only netscape is available.
